resources.string: Heres the headline for you: Everything is ruined. Like super ruined.
Heres the subtitle for you: everything is ruined again.

string-array.name: testHeadlines
string-array.item: Heres the headline: Everything is so bad i cant even. I mean the world is literally on fire.
Yeah its as bad as the previous headline says. Also the fire was caused by a gender reveal party. Sigh.
Oh look everyone is happy about a 80 year old struggling to make ends meet, because the video is so cute
Oooo! Look at these cute kittens. They are so adorable. Just look at them being such dorks and adorable all at the same time.
Doomer pilled we are. Heavily. Twitter only makes it worse. Stop DOOMSCROLLING NOW!
I NEED HELP. I STAY ON TWITTER FOR FAR TOO LONG. WHY. WHY?????????

string-array.name: testSubtitles
string-array.item: Climate change is very real. Do not believe what your grandma says from Facebook.
If you dont burn down an entire forest are you really celebrating your childs birth?
I mean, i- I guess thats capitalism for you huh. Welcome to the real world I guess.
Yes. Doomscrolling is a very real word and a problem.
You are stuck here forever muhahahah

string-array.name: continueReadingHeadlinesPlaceholder
string-array.item: Heres the headline: Why do you think this card will have some happy news? lol
Nothing new, everything is going down the shitter.
LOL BITCOIN DOWN BAD. ETH LOSES 50% OF ITS VALUE!
Doggos are dope. They are good frendos. Me like doggos.
I spent some time with a conservative. God save this planet.

string-array.name: continueReadingSubtitlesPlaceholder
string-array.item: Yeah, go back and sleep i guess.
And the shitter is clogged and overflowing.
Just why do I put myself through hell.
